mapper.insert:
insert into pro_category
sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, code, long_code, pid, name, is_leaf, level, ordering, state, att2, att3, att4, att5, att6, date_att1, date_att2, num_att1, num_att2, num_att3, num_att4, remark,
#{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLeaf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordering,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateAtt1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateAtt2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{numAtt1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numAtt2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numAtt3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{numAtt4,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
SELECT pcr.id,bp.id,bp.product_name,pc.id category_id,pc.name category_name,bp.pro_style_id,bp.color_id,bp.product_spec,bp.product_width,bp.product_height,bp.sale_price FROM pro_category pc,product_category_rel pcr,base_product bp WHERE pc.id = pcr.category_id AND pcr.product_id = bp.id AND pc.long_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{categoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND bp.product_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND bp.product_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}

SELECT bp.id,bp.product_name,bb.id brand_id,bb.brand_name brand_name,bp.sale_price sale_price,pc.id category_id,pc.name category_name, bp.pro_style_id,bp.color_id,bp.product_spec,bp.product_width,bp.product_height,bp.sale_price,rp.pic_path FROM pro_category pc,product_category_rel pcr,base_product bp,res_pic rp,base_brand bb WHERE pc.id = pcr.category_id AND pcr.product_id = bp.id AND bp.pic_id = rp.id AND bb.id = bp.brand_id AND pc.long_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{categoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND bp.product_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND bp.product_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

SELECT count(pcr.id) FROM pro_category pc,product_category_rel pcr,base_product bp WHERE pc.id = pcr.category_id AND pcr.product_id = bp.id AND pc.long_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{categoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND bp.product_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND bp.product_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
mapper.update:
update pro_category
long_code = replace(long_code,#{oldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{newCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
where long_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{oldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
mapper.select: select id from pro_category where long_code like CONCAT(#{longCode},'%') and name = #{name} and is_deleted = 0 limit 1
